name: CAPI 1.141.0
body:
**❗❗❗  Warnings ❗❗❗**

- This release contains a known performance degradation that will be fixed with 1.142.0 see: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/pull/3070
- This release contains an update flaw. In special cases when workers get restarted during an update they can block the bosh deployment indefinitely, will be fixed with 1.142.0 see: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/3075

**Highlights**
- `v3/routes` returns shared routes
- Cloud Controller processes large manifests with a hard limit of 1MB
- Various performance improvements (optimized DB queries)

**CC API Version: 2.193.0 and [3.128.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.128.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/5ae7eb1daf93aa4c14896c21090902c8c81c5c73)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/075c303994c71a83f741ff2d88d8d003f2ea310f)
- v3/routes additionally returns shared routes (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3037)
- Enable CC to process large manifests (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3034)
- Add support for multiple certs per syslog_drain_url (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3028)
- Cut DB query complexity in permissions/visibility checks (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3043)
- Misc db optimizations (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3052)
- Use foreign keys more to avoid DB queries (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3033)
- Check space/org permissions by id, not guid (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3021)
- More readable checks to see if any row exists (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3053)
- Clean up unused/unnecessary permissions methods (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3038)
- Fix v3 upgrade guide for audit_events (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3039)
- Fix two typos in API docs (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3031)
- Fix roles table in service instance delete docs (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3023)
- Allow dependabot to update github actions (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3040)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

None

#### Dependency Bumps
- Bump Golang to go1.19.3
- Bump oj from 3.13.21 to 3.13.23
- Bump sequel from 5.61.0 to 5.62.0
- Bump newrelic_rpm from 8.11.0 to 8.12.0
- Bump nokogiri from 1.13.8 to 1.13.9
- Bump parallel_tests from 3.13.0 to 4.0.0
- Bump rubocop from 1.36.0 to 1.38.0
- Bump rspec from 3.11.0 to 3.12.0
- Bump rspec-rails from 6.0.0 to 6.0.1
- Bump nokogiri from 1.13.8 to 1.13.9 in /docs/v3

#### Contributors
@dalvarado, @fhambrec, @johha, @MerricdeLauney, @moleske, @philippthun, @stephanme, @svkrieger, @will-gant

name: CAPI 1.140.0
body:
**❗❗❗  Warnings ❗❗❗**

- This release contains an update flaw. In special cases when workers get restarted during an update they can block the bosh deployment indefinitely, will be fixed with 1.142.0 see: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/3075

**Highlights**

- Introduces a new syslog drain endpoint to support mTLS on syslog-agent
- Allows users to be exempted from the V2 api rate limiter
- Allows credential bindings for inactive service plans

**CC API Version: 2.192.0 and [3.127.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.127.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/12c1fc67721068fd466823d061361189036cc600)

- Update the blobstore max_upload_size default to remove upload size limit (#274)
- Introducing a new syslog drain endpoint (#272, cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2903)
- Remove bits-service leftovers (#273, cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3006)
- Remove unused git submodules (#277)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/bcddbc801e83fd4fb633545f4113e6b9a1732ccc)

- V2 rate limit exclusions (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2993)
- Increase the webdav receive_timeout to 120 seconds (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3010)
- Return correct docker port (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2974)
- POST /v3/service_credential_bindings can now bind inactive service plans (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2972)
- Various sequel improvements (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3008)
- Refactor service_instance_list_fetcher perm logic (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3014)
- Migration to correct column name in asg_timestamps table (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#3013)
- Add an unique index to service_instance_operations (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2929)
- Optimisations for /v3/roles API calls (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2971)
- Reduce db queries for /organizations/:guid/domains (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2997)
- Remove unnecessary db query as admin user for organization_quotas (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2995)
- Return 503 in case of database connection errors (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2969)
- Make console compatible to Ruby 3 (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2990)
- Remove unnecessary db query as admin user for update_route_destinations (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2986)
- Ignore sequel_pg logs (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2982)
- Improve space supporter API doc (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2977)
- Remove redundant locks and transactions (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2967)
- GitHub Workflows security hardening (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2978)
- Remove protobuf as dependency (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2983)
- Remove RequestCount model (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2964)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20220802160500_index_syslog_drain_url.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bcddbc801e83fd4fb633545f4113e6b9a1732ccc/db/migrations/20220802160500_index_syslog_drain_url.rb)
- [20220818142407_add_unique_index_to_service_instance_operations_service_instance_id.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bcddbc801e83fd4fb633545f4113e6b9a1732ccc/db/migrations/20220818142407_add_unique_index_to_service_instance_operations_service_instance_id.rb)
- [20220915134500_drop_request_counts_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bcddbc801e83fd4fb633545f4113e6b9a1732ccc/db/migrations/20220915134500_drop_request_counts_table.rb)
- [20221003231438_correct_asg_latest_update_id_column_name.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bcddbc801e83fd4fb633545f4113e6b9a1732ccc/db/migrations/20221003231438_correct_asg_latest_update_id_column_name.rb)

#### Dependency Bumps

- Bump Golang to go1.19.2
- Bump newrelic_rpm from 8.9.0 to 8.11.0

- Bump kubeclient from 4.10.0 to 4.10.1
- Bump sequel_pg from 1.16.0 to 1.17.0
- Bump sinatra-contrib from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2
- Bump sequel from 5.60.1 to 5.61.0
- Bump psych from 4.0.5 to 4.0.6
- Bump sinatra from 2.2.2 to 3.0.1
- Bump pg from 1.4.3 to 1.4.4
- Bump rspec-rails from 5.1.2 to 6.0.0
- Bump solargraph from 0.46.0 to 0.47.2
- Bump parallel_tests from 3.12.0 to 3.13.0
- Bump spring from 4.0.0 to 4.1.0
- Bump json-schema and jsprim in /docs/v3
- Bump yargs-parser and yargs in /docs/v3
- Bump express from 4.18.1 to 4.18.2 in /docs/v3

#### Contributors

@dalvarado, @dark5un, @fhambrec, @ionphractal, @johha, @jpalermo, @kathap, @MerricdeLauney, @philippthun, @samcolson4, @sashashura, @stephanme, @will-gant, @xandroc

name: CAPI 1.138.0
body:
**Highlights**

This release contains two experimental features:

Deploying Cloud Controller using Puma (instead of Thin) is now possible via a [configuration option](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/blob/develop/jobs/cloud_controller_ng/spec#L1231)

For now, this is intended for performance testing and not for production use.  Please beware that Cloud Controller metrics have not been adapted to account for multiple workers on a single VM, and will behave unpredictably when using Puma as a server.

Deploying all Cloud Controller ruby jobs with the experimental Ruby YJIT compiler is also available via a [configuration option](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/blob/develop/jobs/cloud_controller_ng/spec#L1227).  This feature may improve performance at the expense of memory usage. This is also not recommended for production use.

**CC API Version: 2.191.0 and [3.126.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.126.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/41faa8c319b9342c170df8f5109da2509a767c09)
Add experimental option to use Puma instead of Thin: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/pull/269
Add experimental option to enable Ruby YJIT compiler: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/pull/270


### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/05f6cd8f8d3529d5bf8aaccfa2b9c4e75bbfb497)
Make route destinations ordering consistent https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/pull/2861 
Fix service instance operations duplicates root cause https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/pull/2916
Print RUBY_DESCRIPTION to stdout on startup https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/pull/2966 
Enable opting for Puma webserver instead of Thin: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/pull/2965

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

None

#### Dependency bumps:
bump fog-aws from 3.14.0 to 3.15.0


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/compare/1.137.0...1.138.0

name: CAPI 1.132.0
body:
**Highlights**

### Notice: This release breaks cf-push when using Google Cloud Storage S3 Interoperability Keys. 

This release upgrades to Ruby 3 which causes errors in fog-google gem when using Google Cloud Storage S3 Interoperability Keys. Authenticating with GCS with service account keys won't be affected. 

We are currently working with the maintainers of fog-google on a fix and will cut a release as soon as possible. 

**CC API Version: 2.185.0 and [3.120.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.120.0/)**

name: CAPI 1.129.0
body:
**Highlights**

**CC API Version: 2.182.0 and [3.117.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.117.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### Notice: This update introduces a new service operation state

This release adds `initial` to the list of values for the state of a service operation. The `initial` state indicates that no response from the service broker has been received yet.

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/c1e933534fee2c7ce0cfc31c7ddb57cb73bfdcd7)

- Make telemetry_log_path config optional (#233)

- Clean-up leftovers from jobs control scripts (#238)
- Add bionic nfs blobs (#241)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/34fe6c237d88a613b40211179db4779ede55cc61)

- Prevent inconsistencies when cancelling service binding/instance creations (cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2697)

name: CAPI 1.125.0
body:
**Highlights**

**CC API Version: 2.179.0 and [3.114.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.114.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### Notice: This update contains breaking changes

This release contains upgrade of Ruby on Rails dependencies to Ruby on Rails 6.1 (from Ruby on Rails 5).  One change introduced a [new interface for the Error class](https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/32313).

While upgrading Cloud Controller VMs to this release, new jobs created by API servers containing the Rails 6 upgrade may serialize the new Errors interface in the database as part of jobs for the Worker VMs to pick up.  Worker VMs which have not upgraded, and are still running Cloud Controller with Rails 5, will fail to deserialize the Error class's new interface.

While there is an existing mitigation in place, this mitigation may not be sufficient for large foundations which might still experience app push downtime as a result.  Please see cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#2748 for more details


### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/befce72e3dfc60c8fd4be5c4e08ff9b0b0af8ae8)

name: CAPI 1.120.0
body:
**Highlights**

CAPI 1.120.0 contains a change to the optional rate_limiter inside of ccng.  Previously every request to the rate limiter would result in a database read and write, this lead to performance issues in large foundations.  Now the optional rate_limiter will measure these requests in memory on the individual API VM.  

**CC API Version: 2.174.0 and [3.109.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.109.0/)**

name: CAPI 1.111.0
body:
**Highlights**
* Adds preliminary support for experimental `SpaceApplicationSupporter` role, based on [this proposal](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cfar-proposals/issues/22). This role is disabled by default, and is not yet ready for public consumption.

**CC API Version: 2.166.0 and [3.101.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.101.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/7727a88ec4ef0b09b670b32c6aaef3405d5f288b)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #191: Hide user guid header from client
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #192: Allow configuration of different (i.e. json) escaping for access log
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #193: Update `psql` lib to postgres version 11.11
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #194: Monit healthcheck exit code logging does not work
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #195: Invoke restart drain for failed healthcheck
- bumped expat dependancy from version 2.2.5 to 2.3.0 [commit](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/commit/532de7b924069bd68b704e08f153b6e7329399fc)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/a3a1fc74df66e4532d217714a6fedea808247866)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2196](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2196): CLI user can see a diff when pushing that respects arguments and flags
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2210](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2210): Create Space Application Supporter role in ccdb and allow role to be assigned to a user
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2213](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2213): `/v3/service_plans` endpoint is slow in deployments with large numbers of service plan visibilities
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2247](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2247): Allow sparse instance indexes
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2248](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2248): API endpoint `manifest_diff` is incorrectly marking processes as being removed and re-added rather than indicating process-level changes
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2249](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2249): Ordering of paginated `/v3/roles` is inconsistent
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2251](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2251): Space application supporter role
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng [#2255](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/issues/2255): Speed up v3 security groups

name: CAPI 1.109.0

name: CAPI 1.107.0
body:
**Highlights**

Improve performance of `POST /v3/service_plan/:guid/visibility`. Previously, when a plan was visible in many (tens of thousand) of orgs, adding a new org to the list was slow. We no longer list the organizations in the response and the algorithm for adding/replacing orgs has been changed so that it no longer loads all the organization visibilities.

name: CAPI 1.105.0

* GA v3 service credential binding

name: CAPI 1.103.0
body:
**WARNING**

This release contains a change in which the `NamedAppManifestMessage` is renamed to `AppManifestMessage`, resulting in downtime during `cf push` during an upgrade to this release since the API enqueues a job using the old `NamedAppManifestMessage` but new workers picking up that job no longer recognize this class. If using `cf-deployment`, a mitigation for this downtime is setting `serial=true` on the API instance group to ensure that API VMs update before the worker VMs.

**Highlights**

- V3 Service Route Bindings are no longer experimental
- V3 Service Visibilities are no longer experimental
- App restart action is no longer experimental

**CC API Version: 2.158.0 and [3.93.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.93.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/a4c9462e08792150e4073ff1badd7d4e8bb76824)

None

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/64dc9bb5f65802ca3db39afc77de407072b1b009)

- **API** client can filter **service binding resources** by **guids** and **created_ats** and **updated_ats** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175686797)
-  **API** client should NOT see **manifest diffs** for **unchanged** sidecar memory [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174829325)
- App restart action is no longer experimental [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175789651)
- **v3** Create service cred binding type key **async**  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174163869)
- **v3** Create service cred binding type key **sync broker response** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174147679)
- **v3** GA v3 service route bindings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175559034)
- **v3** Orphan mitigation on failed route/credential bindings creation [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174878594)
- **v3** Orphan mitigation on failed service key binding creation [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175742023)
- **v3** Prepare to GA v3 service route bindings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175559041)
- **v3** Service route binding list should accept order_by [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171359160)
- **v3** Validate quotas when creating service cred binding of type **key** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174146711)
- **v3** Validate request to create service cred binding of type **key** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174145595)
- **v3**: Recursively delete a user-provided service instance [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171728591)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20201124153320_create_service_key_operations.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/64dc9bb5f65802ca3db39afc77de407072b1b009/db/migrations/20201124153320_create_service_key_operations.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#1574: Field `username` is set to null when getting users as admin [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174806614)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#1602: **Disabling resource matching** feature flag should **stop populating** the resource cache [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/172640608)

#### Known issues
- Service credential binding of type key fail to be created in v3 experimental API -  This resource should be created asynchronously in the worker, however, the required config for the worker is missing. Created [PR](cloudfoundry/capi-release/pull/186) to fix that issue.

name: CAPI 1.101.0
body:
### WARNING

This release includes a DB migration that assumes that the `service_bindings` table currently has no duplicate rows, according to the unique constraint of (service_instance_guid, app_guid). It is recommended that you manually remove duplicate entries from the database if this causes any issues.

**CC API Version: 2.156.0 and [3.91.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.91.0/)**

name: CAPI 1.100.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Improve performance of listing routes on the v3 API
- Expand support for [filtering operators](https://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.90.0/#filters) on the v3 API (experimental)

**CC API Version: 2.155.0 and [3.90.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.90.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/ad85d8d2cf34ae4c37807762c962adcf6bcccbe6)

- Remove vestigial `bulk_api` config option from CCNG [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175080279)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/2e565a7bcbef10a25151a5f712dee3f0a9fa2071)

- **API** client can **order apps** by **state** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173475906)
- **API** client can filter **a variety of resources** by **guids** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173803161)
- **API** client can filter **audit events** that did **NOT target** a resource with a given **target guid** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174159766)
- **API** client can filter **feature flags** by **updated_ats** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173720279)
- **Admin** users should be able to **list routes** in a **performant** manner for large environments [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174499866)
- **v3** Add link to service credential bindings for SI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174085807)
- **v3** Add link to service route bindings for SI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174085821)
- **v3** Create service cred binding between app and MSI **async**  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174119280)
- **v3**: Respect "Retry-After" header when polling Last Operation for a binding [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174144484)
- **v3**: Respect plan "max_polling_duration" defined in broker catalog when creating route bindings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174398273)
- **v3**: delete a route binding **async** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174383882)
- **v3**: delete a route binding **sync** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174191028)
- Fix `label` field incorrectly appearing in pagination filters [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175071777)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

None

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/capi-release#181: Add config parameter for fog debugging
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#1046: Events API: filter on `acteeName`, and add "not equal to" operator [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174159766)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#1379: CF cloud controller events inconsistent [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166785822)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#1802: V3 Apps do not get the proper amount of memory for staging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/174473957)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng#1893: Service broker client does not handle redirects [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/175213685)

name: CAPI 1.97.0
body:
**WARNING**

This release includes a regression that significantly slows resource matching for Azure blobstores. It is not recommended to use this release with Azure blobstores unless you disable the `resource_matching` feature flag.

**Highlights**

**CC API Version: 2.152.0 and [3.87.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.87.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/4899333c053273e8a24036c1f803adb70c67218f)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #173: Bump nginx to 1.17.7 to clear compliance findings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173199866)
- Address #173543199 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173543223)
- Consumer of app metrics can add tags via labels [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171285377)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/214fda4cff32bc6a28aad0adef1bda456bc99bea)
- **API** client author can see documentation about **encoding query parameters** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173720501)
- **API** client author can see information in the **upgrade guide** about how to **filter audit events** using **inequality operators** on v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173277412)
- **API** client can **filter audit events** that occurred **at a timestamp** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173517696)

name: CAPI 1.96.0
body:
**Highlights**
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1690: Orphaned mitigation on service instance update failures [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173291140)

**CC API Version: 2.151.0 and [3.86.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.86.0/)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/ae31aead99eb93578800963362ce5e60c61126cd)
**v3**: Updating *maintenance_info* only (a.k.a. upgrading a SI) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171702179)


### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/1df36b10f8aea6fbcfcc8e24836d2353af3ffabd)
- **API** client author can see information in the **upgrade guide** about how to use **audit events** on v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171468630)
- **API** client can **filter audit events** that occurred **after a timestamp** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173254628)
- **API** client can **filter audit events** that occurred **after or at a timestamp** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173254625)
- **API** client can **filter audit events** that occurred **before a timestamp** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171468508)
- **API** client can **filter audit events** that occurred **before or at a timestamp** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173254626)
- **API** client can see that the **generate app manifest** endpoint is **no longer experimental** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173459109)
- **CI** Fix flaky test ReoccurringJob waits for the polling interval [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173224268)
- **CI** Fix flaky test Service Broker catalog validations unique service names [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173514401)
- **v3** Make errors from quota validation more user friendly [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173112137)
- **v3** Update create SI error when using an unavailable plan [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173056888)
- **v3** Updating a SI originating from an unavailable plan [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173083607)
- **v3**: Updating *maintenance_info* and other fields at the same time (a.k.a. upgrading a SI) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/172861407)
- **v3**: Updating *maintenance_info* only (a.k.a. upgrading a SI) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171702179)
- Add ADR to explain implementation decisions for Roles. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170144702)
- As a v3 enthusiast, I expect to be able to create a Task using the v3 api [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171785772)
- As a v3 enthusiast, I expect to be able to create a Task using the v3 api and see the logs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171785787)
- As a v3 enthusiast, I expect to be able to create a Task using the v3 api for docker apps [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/172175886)
- As a v3 enthusiast, I expect to be able to terminate a task [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171785848)
- Emit app events in a way that is consumable by cf-for-k8s logging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/172415438)
- Review and update the **upgrade guide** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173204211)
- Review and update the **v3 API docs** Resources and Experimental Resources sections [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173368325)
- Review and update the **v3 API docs** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173204092)
- Usage events are **not experimental** in the v3 API docs and v3 link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169238045)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1611: Add deployable property to revisions endpoints. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/172986170)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1625: Unusable Buildpacks If Upload Fails [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173038631)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1690: Orphaned mitigation on service instance update failures [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173291140)
- rotate the certs for our concourse director and everything it's deployed [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/173368867)

name: CAPI 1.94.0
body:
**DO NOT USE**
This release contains a bug that can trigger service instance data loss.

**Highlights**

- Resolved issue with rolling deployments not working properly on Windows

**CC API Version: 2.149.0 and [3.84.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.84.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/46db33bfff250bdd7934e2f4bf8a59f6c020f895)

- cloudfoundry/capi-release #168: Package ruby-2.4.6-r0.9.0 obsolete [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171692815)

- Space Features are **not experimental** in the API docs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171158465)
- Update service plan response object [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170825981)
- Using a space quota with unlimited memory results in a "memory exceeded" error [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171283079)
- add tests and fix endpoints for deleting with metadata [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171032119)
- capi-k8s-release can be configured to use local dev OCI images OR publicly available defaults [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170714119)
- when updating v3/build state, developers in other spaces shouldn't be able to trigger 403s [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170938881)



#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20200210103523_create_service_plan_metadata.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/17784375baab02755ab622c9067cd64472bf9a56/db/migrations/20200210103523_create_service_plan_metadata.rb)
- [20200211194856_change_revision_env_vars_to_text.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/17784375baab02755ab622c9067cd64472bf9a56/db/migrations/20200211194856_change_revision_env_vars_to_text.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1552: Make sure V2 endpoints can delete service offerings, brokers, instances [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170913379)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1555: Starting an app with a lot of env variables results in CF-DatabaseError [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/171182948)

name: CAPI 1.90.0
body:
**Highlights**
- We fixed a bug in the POST /v3/service_brokers endpoint relating to which users can create service brokers. Previously the space_scoped_private_broker_creation feature flag was being ignored. This feature flag allows an administrator to disallow SpaceDevelopers from creating service brokers. The feature flag is now respected.
- Revisions enabled by default for all apps
- Sidecars now buildpack deployable for Java apps

**CC API Version: 2.145.0 and [3.80.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.80.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/d9d4eb522e400b7567effd8bb1fa89805add587f)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #163: Enable second token_secret for symmetric key rotation [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170240800)


### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/b7fac1b4bbc3401f0bafeb425d2184563482777e)

- **API** client author can see the v3 **upgrade guide** in the **v3 API docs** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169295766)
- **API** client can **apply** a quota to organizations [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973487)
- **API** client can **create** a **role and user** in a single request [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170061485)
- **API** client can **create** a space quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135205)
- **API** client can **create** a space quota as an **org manager** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165136427)
- **API** client can **create** a space quota with one or more **associated spaces** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135204)
- **API** client can **create** an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973386)
- **API** client can **define app limits** for a space quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135203)
- **API** client can **define app limits** for an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973396)
- **API** client can **define domain limits** for an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973403)
- **API** client can **define route limits** for a space quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135200)
- **API** client can **define route limits** for an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973402)
- **API** client can **define service limits** for a space quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135202)
- **API** client can **define service limits** for an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973398)
- **API** client can **delete** an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973539)
- **API** client can **discover** organization quotas on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973378)
- **API** client can **discover** space quotas on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135207)
- **API** client can **filter destinations** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167543915)
- **API** client can **filter** organization quotas [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168915390)
- **API** client can **get details** of a space quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165135196)
- **API** client can **get details** of an organization quota [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973451)
- **API** client can **list** organization quotas [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973467)
- **API** client can **update** organization quotas [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164973475)
- **API** client can create an organization quota with one or more **associated organizations** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164993199)
- **API** client can see **inline route destinations** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167543897)
- **API** client can view the **quota link** for an org [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165157674)
- **API** client can view the **quota relationship and link** for a space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165157469)
- **API** client should see **more descriptive error** when they try to assign a space quota to a space **outside the quota's org** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170781312)
- **API** client should see a **deployment status.value** of active when a deployment is deploying or canceling [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168888321)
- **API** clients can specify at most **100 destinations** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166171216)
- Add api version to telemetry header  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167713852)
- Add docs for service_broker API endpoints [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169620030)
- Add link to service offerings from service broker read and list responses [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170677375)
- Annotations with prefixed keys are not being removed  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170868705)
- App dev pushing an app with special characters gets an unknown error message [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168811666)
- As Eirini operator I expect that memory values from CAPI are respected in Eirini staging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170075431)
- As a /v3 API user, I want to GET a list of service offerings filtered by Service Broker Name [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169363735)
- As a /v3 API user, I want to GET a list of service offerings filtered by name [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170870535)
- As a /v3 API user, I want to GET all service offerings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169341820)
- As a /v3 API user, I want to GET all service plans [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170725626)
- As a /v3 API user, I would like to add (PATCH) metadata for an existing service broker resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169478723)
- As a /v3 API user, I would like to add (POST) metadata for a new service broker resource  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169543665)
- As a /v3 API user, I would like to update / delete (PATCH) metadata for a service broker resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169478725)
- As a k8s operator, I expect that staging pods have the same labels and annotations as application pods [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170206610)
- As a v3 API admin user, I want to delete a service offering [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166898605)
- As a v3 API space developer user, I want to delete a service offering of a space scoped broker [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170645148)
- As an operator, when a service offering is deleted via the v3 API, an audit event is logged [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166898638)
- Capture 'app start` and 'app stop' events for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170242054)
- Deadlocks when running roles migration in Postgres [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170321550)
- Determine if kpack build succeeds or fails [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169373200)
- Document service offerings object [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170644025)
- Enable revisions by default for apps [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170083328)
- Ensure non-string telemetry entries are always integers [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170877692)
- Improve formatting for warning messages [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169565481)
- Send package to build endpoint and build OCI image with kpack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169373163)
- Service broker creation should respect `space_scoped_private_broker_creation` feature flag [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170849314)
- Service plans list : support feature flag `hide_marketplace_from_unauthenticated_users` [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170643605)
- Update service_offering object [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170701141)
- Users & Roles are **not experimental** in the API docs and v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176667)
- `origin: buildpack` sidecars should be compatible with java apps [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168994245)
- v2 - Capture events for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169882542)
- v2/apps/:guid/env returns incorrect environment variable info when revisions are enabled [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170740069)
- v3 - Capture `Rolled Back App' & `Create Sidecar` events for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170061504)
- v3 - Capture events for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169882468)
- v3/build authorization for state update [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170564289)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20191125192326_create_kpack_lifecycle_data.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/b7fac1b4bbc3401f0bafeb425d2184563482777e/db/migrations/20191125192326_create_kpack_lifecycle_data.rb)

name: CAPI 1.89.0
body:
**Highlights**

**CC API Version: 2.144.0 and [3.79.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.79.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/c3af0a025b66e0d316110698a6bbb40766fcad6a)

- cloudfoundry/capi-release #159: bump libpq to postgres 11.5 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169647794)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #161: Remove duplicate YAML field in spec [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169770390)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #160: Add `route_services_enabled` to worker config [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169753862)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/918c82dc1a719f663e4dc183c9d7217f88270d52)

- **API** client can **create** a role for a user **in a space** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176815)
- **API** client can **delete** a role [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176828)
- **API** client can **filter** roles [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164447203)
- **API** client can **filter** users by **username and origin** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169737392)
- **API** client can **get details** of a role [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176853)
- **API** client can **include organizations** when viewing roles [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165366323)
- **API** client can **include users** when viewing roles [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176870)
- **API** client can **list** roles [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176845)
- **API** client can **see users with roles** in orgs/spaces they are members of [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168117402)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **adding/removing** roles on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165865004)
- **API** client can see **login** url on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169331167)
- **API** client can see **platform info** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169098085)
- **API** client sees a **💎 luxurious error 💎** when attempting to create a **space-level role** for a user **without a role in that space's organization** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169688314)
- **API** client sees an **error** when trying to **delete an organization_user role** of the user **still has a space-level role** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169762317)
- **API** client should not get an **UnknownError** when **creating a role by name** and **UAA is unavailable** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169737750)
- **API** client with **organization manager** role can **assign org roles** to unaffiliated users **by username** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169353303)
- **API:** update role's user relationship to use **"username" field instead of "name"** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169769892)
- **Regression:** Deleting a roles fails on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170059486)
- App dev pushing an app with special characters gets an unknown error message [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168811666)
- As a /v3 API user, I want the correct permissions model to be applied for my interactions with the API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169341752)
- As a /v3 API user, I want to GET all service offerings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169341820)
- CC can be configured to talk directly to a k8s cluster [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169373954)
- CC clock shouldn't care about BBS with OPI staging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166813738)
- Disambiguate org member and org user [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169787212)
- Environment variable groups are **not experimental** in the API docs and v3 link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953938)
- Investigate flake in update_service_broker_command_test [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169628834)
- Querying two labels on apps route while also querying for space_guids returns 500 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/170110304)
- SpaceDevelopers should not be able to see global service broker URLs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169590766)
- When a service broker is deleted via v2, v3 create and update error message needs to be improved [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169596494)




#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20191031135500_create_service_broker_update_requests.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/918c82dc1a719f663e4dc183c9d7217f88270d52/db/migrations/20191031135500_create_service_broker_update_requests.rb)
- [20191112121711_add_state_to_service_brokers_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/918c82dc1a719f663e4dc183c9d7217f88270d52/db/migrations/20191112121711_add_state_to_service_brokers_table.rb)
- [20191112154745_drop_service_broker_states_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/918c82dc1a719f663e4dc183c9d7217f88270d52/db/migrations/20191112154745_drop_service_broker_states_table.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1418: POST /v3/apps incorrect returns a 422 when the user has read only access to a space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168042231)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1457: Implement no-op Task client for OPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168869673)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1460: v3-apply-manifest fails with unknown error when mapping tcp routes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168938943)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1465: [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169056106)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1466: Refine metadata api doc alphanumeric wording [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169059708)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1476: add ability to include domains on /v3/routes and /v3/routes/:guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169239476)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1486: Make /v3 API service broker patches atomic [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169566714)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1487: As a /v3 API user, I want to GET a single service offering using a GUID [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169567838)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1489: Show brokers created using /v2 API in `available` state [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169623593)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1491: Update random route generation to add 2 letter suffix [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169762723)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1492: Refactor service offering request specs to use shared examples [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169777737)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1493: Merge service broker states into service_brokers table [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169777851)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1495: filtering org domains by label blows up if you give it an invalid label. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169855490)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1497: /v3/routes with space_guids, organization_guids, or domain_guids 500s [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169884201)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1500: V3 service_offerings visibility for space-scoped offerings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169894646)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1501: V3 /v3/service_offerings/:guid - add links and relationships [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169900957)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1502: Change label selector query logic to allow complex queries [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169909407)
- set-{space/org}-role errors when run as {space/org} manager [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169440492)

name: CAPI 1.88.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Added support for docker images on Erini
- Added strategy to deployment
- Resolved a bug that caused staging failure when an ASG is created with erroneous whitespaces

**CC API Version: 2.143.0 and [3.78.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.78.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/a07fb02608701a6c83468454cc00f6572d63e5fe)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/e04e45c1bc71f2035a7ac67a013e402511482919)

- **API** client can **create** a role for a user **by username** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164343021)
- **API** client can **create** a role for a user **in a space** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176815)
- **API** client can **create** a role for a user **in an organization**  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164342477)
- **API** client can **update** running and staging environment variable groups [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953997)
- **API** client can see that roles are **recursively deleted** when their associated user, space, or organization is deleted [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164445938)
- Add strategy to deployment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166458689)
- As API V3 User, and Space Developer I have read-only access to global service brokers [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169091099)
- As a developer, when using Eirini **with OPI Staging**, I expect to be able to push docker images [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168003359)
- As a platform operator, when a service broker is registered via v3 API, I want to see an audit event [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166898654)
- Better message when URL is not valid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169256991)
- Delete service brokers controller spec [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169184003)
- Environment variable groups are **not experimental** in the API docs and v3 link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953938)
- Mark environment variable groups as **deprecated** in the v2 API docs with a link to the new, glorious v3 resources [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953949)
- Send more information from CC to Eirini [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168003564)
- [Update One] As a V2 API user, I want the service instance PATCH requests for arbitrary params from CAPI to my broker to include the instance's maintenance_info [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169087442)
- [Update One] CAPI needs to send previous_maintenance_info when changing plans [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169090116)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1471: PATCH endpoint for v3 service_brokers [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169091475)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1473: PATCH requests to /v3/service_brokers/:service_broker_guid failure scenarios [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169120150)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1478: [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169333098)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1480: Fix error when deactivated plan warning is issued. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169420625)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1481: Improve validation failure when service broker URL is not valid. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169420830)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20191014212939_add_guid_and_timestamps_to_roles_join_tables.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/e04e45c1bc71f2035a7ac67a013e402511482919/db/migrations/20191014212939_add_guid_and_timestamps_to_roles_join_tables.rb)
- [20191014233211_fill_guid_and_timestamps_for_roles_join_tables.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/e04e45c1bc71f2035a7ac67a013e402511482919/db/migrations/20191014233211_fill_guid_and_timestamps_for_roles_join_tables.rb)
- [20191023211109_add_strategy_to_deployment.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/e04e45c1bc71f2035a7ac67a013e402511482919/db/migrations/20191023211109_add_strategy_to_deployment.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues
- Correctly handle whitespace in IP ranges [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/169321616)

name: CAPI 1.87.0
body:
**Highlights**
- Added support for metadata when creating routes
- Made log-cache endpoint more discoverable
- Added ability to add sidecars to revisions
- Added support for buildpack configured sidecars

**CC API Version: 2.142.0 and [3.77.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.77.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/28f43e71e7bc289d2445ac336dae4f46be1ab7b9)

### [Cloud Controller]

- **API** User should be able to use the `default-route` key in the manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168176662)
- **API** client add, modify, and remove **metadata** on a user [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164473359)
- **API** client can **delete** a user [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176792)
- **API** client can **discover** audit events on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168647624)
- **API** client can **discover** environment variable groups on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953923)
- **API** client can **discover** roles on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176737)
- **API** client can **filter** audit events [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164875426)
- **API** client can **filter** users [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168119194)
- **API** client can **get details** of an audit event [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164874862)
- **API** client can **list** audit events [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164874844)
- **API** client can **query users** with label_selector [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164473388)
- **API** client can **update** running and staging environment variable groups [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953997)
- **API** client can **view** running and staging **environment variable groups** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167953987)
- **API** client can not pass `no_route` query parameter when applying a manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168229502)
- **API** client can observe the **metadata section in docs** examples for users [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164473377)
- **API** space apply manifest 500's when invalid buildpacks are given [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168182713)
- Add log cache endpoint discovery to CAPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168083320)
- App dev and operator receives a helpful error message if they attempt to `cf enable-ssh` and ssh has been disabled on the global or space level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168935014)
- App dev should be able to use `cf rename` without using the v2 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168654360)
- As a developer, when using Eirini, I expect to be able to push docker images [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167367263)
- As a developer, when using Eirini, I expect to be able to push docker images in **registry secured by username/password** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168003415)
- As a v3 API consumer, when I try to delete a broker that has service instances, I get an informative failure message [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166608611)
- As a v3 API user, my POST requests to /v3/service_brokers are asynchronous and fail or warn [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168105708)
- As a v3 API user, my POST requests to /v3/service_brokers are asynchronous and successful [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168083026)
- As a v3 user, when I request a job status, I want to see any warnings that may have occurred [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168663244)
- As an API user, I can delete service brokers that have no instances via v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166631760)
- Asynchronous **DELETE** on /v3/service_brokers/:service_broker_guid **fails** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168511249)
- Asynchronous **DELETE** on /v3/service_brokers/:service_broker_guid is **successful** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168511247)
- Audit events are **not experimental** in the API docs and v3 link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165110873)
- Buildpack configured sidecars - defining origin [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168388189)
- Capture `build-complete` event for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168173679)
- Make sidecars work with revisions - Add [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167853630)
- Mark resource matches as **deprecated** in the v2 API docs with a link to the new, glorious v3 resources [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168739596)
- Refactor /v3/service_brokers... to use shared examples test pattern [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165999827)
- Resource Matches are **not experimental** in the API docs and v3 link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168739598)
- Setup CI job to run `stepper: true` annotated tests in CI separately in parallel to cc_units [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168862401)
- [V3 API] Rename "credentials" to "authentication" in the service brokers resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168373589)
- `origin: buildpack` sidecars [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167658801)


#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations
None

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- **API** Droplet upload should accept a `.tar.gz` file [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168553082)
- **API** User should not get a 500 when patching destinations where an existing one is upgraded to having weights [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168888240)
- Clicking on the "Resources" header in the v3 API docs goes to the incorrect section [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168880318)
- Extract proper helper for race condition testing [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168720975)
- Fix deadlock on parallel broker creation [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168533602)
- Global feature flag to disable resource matching [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/152662647)
- cloudfoundry/cli #1745: not enough informations for service binding request failures [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167689045)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1407: Access service usage events as global auditor [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167792597)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1410: ports field no longer experimental [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167853791)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1416: Bind failure during push shows service name [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168025059)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1417: Add docker support in Eirini [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168025319)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1421: Default new_memory to 0 in sidecar validator [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168068179)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1423: Upgrade fog-aliyun to 0.3.5 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168144076)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1427: V3 service broker delete 166631760 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168243214)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1429: Fetching usage events after_guid when that guid has been pruned [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168323383)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1431: Change include paths to match relationship names [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168357368)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1432: Getting a 500 when assigning a new droplet after some deployment madness [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168388463)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1435: Add log-cache endpoint to / [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168433998)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1436: Inefficient SQL query is causing API latency up to 60 sec [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168436951)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1438: Delete a broker with SIs will fail with a helpful message [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168452051)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1439: Add app sub-resource relationships [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168469932)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1440: As a v3 API user, my POST requests to /v3/service_brokers are asynchronous [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168476345)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1445: v3-apply-manifest fails with unknown error when mapping apps.internal route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168525190)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1446: `SpaceListFetcher.fetch_all` fails when `organization_guids` and `label_selector` are both specified [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168527952)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1447: Use a nested query to allow searching spaces with orgs & labels [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168528992)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1458: Revert "Revert "Add docker support in Eirini"" [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168875009)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1461: Rename 'credentials' to 'authentication' when creating a service broker [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168978867)

- cloudfoundry/routing-release #152: Clarify on the usage of multiple app ports [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167555824)
