- Mark audit events as **deprecated** in the v2 API docs with a link to the new, glorious v3 resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164874896)

name: CAPI 1.86.0
body:
**Highlights**
- Resolved bug that cause `cf push` to error out when pushing to CF using Eirini
- Added initial telemetry collection. This is still early days for telemetry, so collection mechanism may change. Currently telemetry is written to the telemetry.log file located on the API vm at `/var/vcap/sys/log/cloud_controller_ng/telemetry.log `
- Added a CANCELING state to rolling deployment status when a user cancels rolling deploy
- V3 Routes are now GA 
- **Breaking change**: `windows2016` stack support has been removed as it's been replaced by the `windows` stack.

**CC API Version: 2.141.0 and [3.76.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.76.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/fe58540f2bd6ae0284f3536935877e92bb374dba)


### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/e0cf2dd66d349fcbe957896949975c9bbdd7225a)

- **API** client can **create** a user for a **UAA client** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164231883)
- **API** client can **create** a user for a **UAA user** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176715)
- **API** client can **delete** a space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163341362)
- **API** client can **delete** a user [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176792)
- **API** client can **delete** an organization [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163341376)
- **API** client can **discover** users on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176730)
- **API** client can **get details** of a user [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176754)
- **API** client can **list** users [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164176776)
- **API** client can **suspend** an organization [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164128236)
- **API** client can get **usage summary** for an organization [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163341373)
- **API** client can no longer user the **status** field for v3 organizations [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167329109)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **org create/update/delete**  on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167743837)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **space update/delete** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167742979)
- **API** client can view the **origin** of a user [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164348026)
- Add `CANCELING` as a status for a deployment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167742729)
- Add query param to app list endpoint to filter by app lifecycle type [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166446581)
- As a PM for CAPI, I want to be able to see when a deployment happens for an app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167440513)
- As an API user, if I send a request for maintenance with a non-semver version, I should receive a useful error [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167139282)
- As an API user, if I try to request maintenance and a plan change on an update request, I get a useful error [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164962390)
- Capture `bind-service` event for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167575109)
- Capture `create-app` event for CAPI telemetery [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167574882)
- Capture `create-build` event for CAPI telemetry [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167574956)


#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

None

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1402: Remove API version checks from v2 controllers [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167680433)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1408: update trafficcontroller decorator to handle container metrics split … [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167818839)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1411: `cf push` returns 500 when using Eirini/OPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167857361)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1424: Bump mixin-deep from 1.3.1 to 1.3.2 in /docs/v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/168149548)
- rename `database_parts` to `database` in response to timebomb test [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167850970)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #151: Remove support for the "windows2016" stack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167976909)

name: CAPI 1.85.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Added additional port information to process stats endpoint when route integrity is enabled
- Added space/organization/app guid and name to app container metrics and log envelopes
- API client can no longer use v3 route mappings

**CC API Version: 2.140.0 and [3.75.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.75.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/2630672b09a558f29dade7d28443b30aaa371951)

- Monit-enforced Memory Limits aren't being applied to generic workers [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167628297)
- Remove consul from tps-watcher [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/160797747)
- As a CF operator, I expect the capi-release components to use the new "flattened" ActualLRP API endpoints and associated instance-specific event types instead of ActualLRPGroup-based ones so that they will continue to function after their future removal [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/158123382)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/3bcc85a6eec389d77b74fd480080a2de3438bafe)

- **API** client can **delete** a space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163341362)
- **API** client can **delete** an organization [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163341376)
- **API** client can no longer use **v3 route mappings** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166239357)
- **API** client can specify **destination ports** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166091491)
- **API** client can specify **destination ports** for a **process that doesn't exist** yet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167497741)
- Add ability to view apps by stack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166750621)
- Add additional port information to process stats endpoint [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166934752)
- Add space/organization/app guid and name to app container metrics and log envelopes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166547293)
- Client developer can cancel deployments in the DEPLOYING status, regardless of reason [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167332850)
- Introduce eager loading for spaces, apps, orgs, and other endpoints [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167214559)
- Make space/organization/app guid and name available for an app on loggregator envelopes emitted by CAPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167404147)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

None

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- BARAs starting apps sometime trigger 500s with "requested resource already exists" [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167495930)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #147: Race condition in pre-start script? [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166959395)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1392: Switch to Actual LRPS BBS endpoint [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167268532)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1394: Remove unused admin_buildpacks_presenter [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167355182)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1395: Remove unused process_delete_fetcher [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167388494)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1396: Upgrade fog-aliyun to 0.3.4 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167413881)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1397: Remove references to app port from copilot [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167610681)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #977: 'Invalid Auth Token' errors after changing 'uaa.issuer' [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/152673415)
- `cc_deployment_updater` job should have the `maximum_health_check_timeout` config key [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167446891)
- V3 manifest-triggered destinations do not work for Docker apps [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167518505)
- V7 push should not attempt to upload bits if an app is a docker app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167461778)
- Deployment updater should handle degenerate deployments [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167460671)
- App can get into weird state after mapping/unmapping routes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167477477)
- API should support docker apps not listening on port 8080 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167149569)

name: CAPI 1.84.0
body:
**Highlights**
- Added ability to define minimum required memory for a sidecar - allows sidecars to work with java apps
- Updated status reporting for deployments - now includes more granular status.  The deployment `state` value is now **DEPRECATED**. Please use deployment status instead.

**CC API Version: 2.139.0 and [3.74.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.74.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.15](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.15/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/13e139cf711ec4b5ede09cb6f9f93b245c78ae50)


- cloudfoundry/capi-release #148: Consume file-server link with HTTPS URL [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167081216)
- New array encryption key format should support an empty array [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167185532)
- As a CF operator, I expect that cloud controller generates https urls to file-server assets via a BOSH link from the file-server so I can be sure communication paths in my foundation are secure [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165913951)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/46b140fdfe7666d6a6738642c9d0573776950455)

- **API** client can **filter** resources by **empty string** values [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167150072)
- **API** client can **filter** resources by **null** values [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167150073)
- **API** client can **list** routes mapped to an app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167179707)
- **API** client can add destinations to a route with **weights** 🏋🏾‍♀️ [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165842090)
- **API** client can no longer use **v3 route mappings** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166239357)
- **API** client can see **documentation for destination** objects [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167204768)
- **API** client can see **documentation** for **destination insertion and replacement** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167214431)
- **API** client can see **weights** in **audit events** for mapping and unmapping routes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166889658)
- **API** user can atomically **delete unmapped routes** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166243990)
- **API** user can see if **matching routes** exist for a domain [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163471990)
- Add memory to the sidecar  POST/GET/PATCH endpoints [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166989591)
- Add memory to the sidecar  in app manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167025220)
- Add query param to app list endpoint to filter by app  stack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166446058)
- Add sidecar memory min requirement for sidecar app manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166797805)
- As a CLI admin or space developer user I can register a space scoped service broker without using v2 endpoints [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166063310)
- As a CLI user, if I request an upgrade but the broker doesn't support it, I should get a useful error [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166541966)
- As a Platform Engineer, I can trace requests from the platform to the service broker [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164954138)
- As a broker author, I should receive maintenance_info on a service instance provision [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165348433)
- CC supports OSBAPI v2.15  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166736412)
- Client developer sees last successful health check for a rolling deployment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167205976)
- Client developer views status for a rolling deployment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167205520)
- Deployment status should be queryable [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167155191)
- Process memory cannot be below sum of sidecar memory [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167025624)
- Update Ruby version for Travis CI to 2.5.5 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167175526)
- Update annotations section in docs to reflect annotations key/prefix [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166983152)




#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190628183006_change_default_route_mapping_weight_to_null.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/46b140fdfe7666d6a6738642c9d0573776950455/db/migrations/20190628183006_change_default_route_mapping_weight_to_null.rb)
- [20190701233808_add_memory_column_to_sidecars.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/46b140fdfe7666d6a6738642c9d0573776950455/db/migrations/20190701233808_add_memory_column_to_sidecars.rb)
- [20190711205517_add_value_and_reason_status_to_deployments.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/46b140fdfe7666d6a6738642c9d0573776950455/db/migrations/20190711205517_add_value_and_reason_status_to_deployments.rb)
- [20190712210940_backfill_status_for_deployments.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/46b140fdfe7666d6a6738642c9d0573776950455/db/migrations/20190712210940_backfill_status_for_deployments.rb)
- [20190716215540_add_status_indices_to_deployments.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/46b140fdfe7666d6a6738642c9d0573776950455/db/migrations/20190716215540_add_status_indices_to_deployments.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- Investigate occasional 500 when creating a deployment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167354945)
- Investigate weird buildpack creation behavior (deadlocks and multiple buildpacks getting same position) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167307452)
- v3-apply-manifest PollableJobs dont seem to update updated_at when their states change [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167241495)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1384: Filtering service plans by service broker id results in CF-DatabaseError [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166974930)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1389: Bump lodash from 4.17.11 to 4.17.14 in /docs/v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167217039)
- Look into Travis CI failures [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/167204600)

name: CAPI 1.83.0
body:
**Highlights**
- VCAP_APPLICATION environment variables now include org guid, org name, process type and process_id
- Annotations key and prefix now conform to same format as K8s annotations metadata
- Service Instance parameter fetching is GA
- Maintenance info descriptions now appears on service plans and service instances

**CC API Version: 2.138.0 and [3.73.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.73.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/adacb2ee3c7bf83192622edcc915c82c2f71c552)

- Co-pilot consumes VIPs from CAPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161849257)
- Enable array format for encryption keys in yml config [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166918347)
- Operator can rotate db encryption keys [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165391361)
- Pipeline: Investigate 404s from the API during SITS [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166748671)
- Update capi-workspace and local repos to use Ruby 2.5.5 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166686434)
- Use an endpoint other than /v2/info as the health check [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166038540)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #144: add internal_route_vip_range to cc route syncer job [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166430483)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #145: Add Eirini mTLS properties to CC clock and worker [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166482629)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/0e883877505e3d5507117475db9c0fb5e29e8f34)

- **API** client add, modify, and remove **metadata** on a route  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164291350)
- **API** client can **insert** one or more **destinations** for a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163578936)
- **API** client can **remove a destination** from a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163578940)
- **API** client can **replace all destinations** for a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163578957)
- **API** client can **view destinations** for a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163579128)
- **API** client can get the **full URL** for a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166115970)
- **API** client can query routes with **label_selector** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164291405)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **route mapping** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165919652)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **route unmapping** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165919647)
- **API** client can see a **link to destinations** for a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166235850)
- **API** user can atomically **delete unmapped routes** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166243990)
- Add audit event for cancelled deployment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163958348)
- Add organization_id and organization_name  to VCAP_APPLICATION environment variables [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166547310)
- Add process_id and process_type to VCAP_APPLICATION environment variables [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166547280)
- As a broker author, I receive maintenance_info in the previous values structure on an update request for an instance [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165348395)
- As a broker author, I want the platform to quickly reject my registration, if I have extra fields in my `maintenance_info` object [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166437605)
- As a ccv3 client, when I create a service broker with a URL that doesn't serve a catalog, the operation should fail without debris [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166216138)
- As a v7 CLI user I want to get warnings when I create a service broker that adds a volume or route service, but this is disabled in the CF config [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166186412)
- As an API consumer, I can see the description of a maintenance associated associated with service instances and plans on the space summary [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166439675)
- As an API consumer, I can see the description of a maintenance associated with a service plan and service instance [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166439615)
- As an API consumer, any maintenance version I request that is different from the current version, should be forwarded to the broker [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166695738)
- As an API consumer, if I request maintenance that the instance has already performed, it should not call the broker [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166545161)
- As an API user, if I request maintenance that the broker thinks is in conflict, I should get a useful error [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165377426)
- Broker rejection of UNBIND during async BIND untested behaviour [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166792343)
- Broker rejection of delete during async SI creation untested behaviour [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166696447)
- Create /v3/spaces with no relationships argument results in a 500 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166855317)
- Create an Architectural Decision Record (ADR) describing our plan for handling annotations with long key names [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166526055)
- Create service broker flow should support authentication types beyond basic [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166266507)
- Create space audit events (audit.space.create) using V3 apis [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166853997)
- Make parameter fetching GA [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164071776)
- Registration of a service broker in v3 should provide useful validation [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166435229)
- See if completed task pruning can be made more performant [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165896395)
- Service instance sharing events should not be experimental [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166898251)
- Update Annotation key to use K8s key conventions  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166447964)
- Update capi-workspace and local repos to use Ruby 2.5.5 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166686434)
- Use an endpoint other than /v2/info as the health check [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166038540)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190531214252_create_route_metadata_tables.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/0e883877505e3d5507117475db9c0fb5e29e8f34/db/migrations/20190531214252_create_route_metadata_tables.rb)

name: CAPI 1.82.0
body:
**Highlights**

- V3 Domains and Droplets are now GA
- Async service bindings are now GA
- Creating, listing and getting a service broker is now supported in V3 as experimental endpoints
- Upgrading individual service instances is now possible through the API if brokers support it
- Rate limiter now correctly limits clients

**CC API Version: 2.137.0 and [3.72.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.72.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/59889ebf0edd15e9fa33cf490eb73e6ef1866965)

- **API** client can **upload bits** for a droplet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165510183)
- Add capi-release BOSH property to disable remaining non-TLS ports [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164937832)
- Enforce that Cloud Controller must always be configured to support a TLS-protected endpoint (default configuration of Cloud Controller) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166344502)



### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/2068e578204205439c73a55dfe0113c16a6c4bbb)

- **API** User can **filter routes** by **space_guid** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166197175)
- **API** client can **delete** a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162425200)
- **API** client can **filter** routes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163496173)
- **API** client can **list** routes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162402733)
- **API** client can **upload bits** for a droplet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165510183)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **droplet upload** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165795606)
- **API** client can see **audit events** for **route delete** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165864430)
- **API** client can see a **link** to the **upload** endpoint for a droplet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165510206)
- **API** client can see when **uploading bits fails** for a droplet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165797052)
- **API** user can **filter domains** by **guid** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166200003)
- API client should NOT see manifest field names in API endpoint errors [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/155859570)
- API error message is unclear for uploading droplet with empty tgz file  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166314443)
- As a developer, I can see the maintenance_info on each service instance and each service plan when fetching a space summary [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165763251)
- As a platform engineer I can see the maintenance_info for a service instance [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165721596)
- As a service broker author, when a plan change is requested for a service instance, I receive maintenance_info of the new plan in the PATCH request [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165766356)
- As a v7 CLI admin user I can register a global service broker without using v2 endpoints [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165969720)
- Async bindings features should be GA'd [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164269824)
- Maintenance info structure should be validated by CC according to the spec [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165560162)
- Mark the service_brokers link as experimental in the /v3 root resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166027102)
- Space scoped service broker representations should contain links to the associated space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165997167)



#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190503090026_add_maintenance_info_to_service_instance.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/2068e578204205439c73a55dfe0113c16a6c4bbb/db/migrations/20190503090026_add_maintenance_info_to_service_instance.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1326: Suggest unauthenticated rate-limited users log in [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165444038)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1340: Add internal api docs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165899367)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1341: Delete critical file [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165949006)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1343: Suspended organizations not visible to SpaceDevelopers on v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166020827)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1346: Mark the service_brokers link as experimental in v3 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166079037)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1347: fix passing application env vars to eirini [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166099116)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1348: V3 service brokers contain a link to the associated space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166115792)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1349: Add maintenance_info to the service_instance and enable update [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166155370)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1355: Add maintenance info in space summary endpoint [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166323451)
- Investigate empty "actee" in `audit.user.organization_user_add` audit events  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/157435097)
- Rate limiter treats client authenticated users as being unauthenticated [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166365323)
- capi release only uses bpm to run processes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/160864402)
- ccng_monit_http_healthcheck can interfere with bbr workflows [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166428770)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #140: pre-backup-lock/post-backup-unlock scripts are not idempotent [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165556252)
- Fix cascading failures caused by monit /v2/info healthcheck restarts [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164263056)
- Incorrect error message when stopping a deploying app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164993544)

name: CAPI 1.81.0
body:
**Highlights**
- Ability to use include parent resources in response for a child resource when you provide the `include` query parameter
- Improved UX around a failed rolling deployment
- Ability to return builds associated with a package 
- Added process_type for multiprocess apps in the container metrics envelope
- Added configurable property to disable routes with shadowing paths on private domains
- Buildpacks are now available on the v3 API

**CC API Version: 2.136.0 and [3.71.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.71.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

**Known Issues:**
* Automated `monit` restarts of Cloud Controller that occur when Cloud Controller exceeds its memory limits fail to restart Cloud Controller. See: [#166314234](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166314234)

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/db04377cde3084835a2208598eea500dea5a092f)

- Add configurable property to disable routes with shadowing paths on private domains [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165724735)
- **CC Operator** should be able to deploy CAPI with **v2 endpoints disabled** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161520839)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/8b7d8eecd38eecf0df65a122554aa07c54bf9a32)

- Add experimental default domain to v3 organizations
  - **API** client can **view the default domain** for an organization [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162976068)
  - **API** User should NOT get a **default domain** with a **router group** id [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165803035)
  - **API** User should not get an **internal default domain** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165797042)
  - **API** client can see a **link to the default domain** for an organization [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162997542)
  - Server side app **manifests** should take an org's **default domain** into account when **creating a random route** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165774538)
- V3 domains
  - **API** client can **add shared organizations** to a domain [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676395)
  - **API** client can **delete** a domain [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676362)
  - **API** client can **filter** domains [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163496542)
  - **API** client can **remove a shared organization** from a domain [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676405)
  - **API** client can add, modify, and remove **metadata** on a domain  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164291065)
  - **API** client can observe the **metadata section in docs** examples for domains [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164291126)
  - **API** client can query domains with **label_selector** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164291097)
  - **API** client can see a **link** for a domain's **shared organizations** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164486890)
  - **API** client can see a **link** for a organization's **domains** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164486926)
- Experimental v3 droplet upload
  - **API** client can **create** a droplet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165517035)
  - **API** client can see **audit events** for **droplet creation** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165795717)
- V3 routes
  - **API** client can **discover** v3 routes resource   [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162105810)
  - **API** client can **get details** of a route [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162400327)
  - **API** client can create a route **with a host** on the v3 API   [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162105821)
  - **API** client can create a route **with a path** on the v3 API   [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162105949)
  - **API** client can see **audit events** for **route creation** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165864426)
  - **API** client with **admin token** can **create a route** for a **scoped domain** on the v3 API   [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162105814)
  - **API** client with **space developer token** can create a route on the v3 API   [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162105824)
- Add configurable property to disable routes with shadowing paths on private domains [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165724735)
- Add include query param for app resources [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165421337)
- Add include query param for space resources [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165695139)
- Add process type (ie. web, worker, etc) into metrics envelope [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165604691)
- As a developer, I can see that a rolling deploy is failing because of the app i pushed [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164642267)
- As a developer, I can see when a deployment has failed [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165433459)
- As an API consumer with the correct permissions, I can make a GET request to /v3/service_brokers [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162088299)
- As an API consumer with the correct permissions, I can make a GET request to /v3/service_brokers/:guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162196956)
- As an API consumer, I can make a GET request to /v3/service_brokers and filter the results [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162088407)
- As an API consumer, I can make a GET request to /v3/service_brokers and order the results [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162088405)
- As an API consumer, I can make a GET request to /v3/service_brokers/:guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162196911)
(https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164894822)
- Filter builds by package ID [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165644769)
- Throw rollback "error" when rolling back to same code and config [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164410170)


#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190430171333_add_last_healthy_at_to_deployments.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/8b7d8eecd38eecf0df65a122554aa07c54bf9a32/db/migrations/20190430171333_add_last_healthy_at_to_deployments.rb)
- [20190502172509_create_domain_metadata_tables.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/8b7d8eecd38eecf0df65a122554aa07c54bf9a32/db/migrations/20190502172509_create_domain_metadata_tables.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/capi-release #141: yaml_escape is not defined in cc_deployment_updater [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165652848)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #137: CC should validate ASGs when created and/or provide feedback to a user pushing an app to an org/space with a badly formatted ASG [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165451086)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1330: Implement stop_index method for the opi app client [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165570586)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1339: bulk audit event deletion causes high database latencyds [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165870840)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1345: Add endpoint GET /v3/service_brokers/:guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166055403)
- Incorrect state in response body for packages create endpoint [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165863988)
- Creating long domain results in confusing error  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166011603)
- Updating current droplet for an app while a rolling deployment is in flight leads to broken deployments and potential app downtime [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162774920)
- User should get 404 if trying to share orgs to domain they can't see [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165643463)

name: CAPI 1.80.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Updated revisions to work with V2 push, restage and restart workflows
- Finished removing cflinuxfs2 defaults from capi-release.  More details [here](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cf-deployment/releases/tag/v8.0.0)
- Ability to upgrade an individual service instance. 

**CC API Version: 2.135.0 and [3.70.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.70.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### Known Issues

* API clients authenticating with a UAA client token will be rate-limited as if they were unauthenticated users. See: [#166365323](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166365323)

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/4c06d4347510ec965aa159a09e04f4742d5eed42)

- Golang 1.12.x Upgrade for OSS Projects [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165268030)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #136: Do not maintain cc_uploader_https_url property for OPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165339722)
- Validate whether we need `cc.opi.cc_uploader_https_url` and reply to CAPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164599149)
- Update nginx package READMEs in capi-release [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165289361)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/e22d075219bcf9b972cab50d6afee71ee71f6fa6)

- **API** client can **block route creation** when applying a manifest at the space level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164998107)
- **API** client can **get details** of a domain on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676342)
- **API** client can create a domain scoped to an organization with **shared organizations** (shared private domain) on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676323)
- **API** client can list what domains are **available in an organization** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162973457)
- **API** client can see a **link** for a organization's **domains** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164486926)
- **API** client can see a **link** to a domain's **owning organization** on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162743922)
- API client can configure binding parameters in the manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/158669166)
- API: Move all domains controller unit tests into request specs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165075402)
- Allow V2 restage when revisions are enabled for an app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165471829)
- As a Platform Engineer I can trigger an update of an individual service instance [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164961906)
- As a Platform Engineer I want to know the maintenance info for a service plan  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164957708)
- As a developer, I can cancel the creation of an asynchronous service instance, so that I don't have to wait for creation to finish [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164046291)
- As a developer, I can see the name of the service broker providing each service instance when fetching a space summary       [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163455079)



#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190409110217_add_maintenance_info_to_service_plan.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/e22d075219bcf9b972cab50d6afee71ee71f6fa6/db/migrations/20190409110217_add_maintenance_info_to_service_plan.rb)
- [20190417232206_add_is_client_to_users_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/e22d075219bcf9b972cab50d6afee71ee71f6fa6/db/migrations/20190417232206_add_is_client_to_users_table.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- Fix MAX_BUILDPACK_NAME_LENGTH and MAX_STACK_LENGTH constant reassignment warnings [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165460555)
- Fix the list and show domains endpoints to present all readable org guids [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165404678)
- Make `cf push` correctly create app revisions [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165366785)
- V2 and revisions bug: CF restage creates a revision with a null droplet guid and empty processes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165368520)
- V2 restart is not creating revisions [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165542128)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1325: Provide artifact name in droplet download action [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/165392708)

name: CAPI 1.79.0
body:
**Highlights**
- Added Sidecar support for processes 
- Added Metadata for Service Instances
- Initial support for staging apps on Eirini

**CC API Version: 2.134.0 and [3.69.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.69.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/c269265ab3e80b566d33226729c07868aaee28af)

- **[Feature Improvement]** improve PDRATs reliability by improving the way autoscaling, usage-service and notifications block on CAPI availability in their BBR scripts [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164409886)
- As a Platform Engineer,  I should be able to easily automate downloading and validating the checksum of BBR [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162153197)
- As a user, to make things simple, I expect to be able to `cf push` using *only* eirini (ie staging works)  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/158463227)
- Consume url from cc_uploader link in OPI config and remove property from jobs that dont perform staging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164557624)
- Platform engineers should be able to perform selective backups against internal blobstores [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163084230)
- Update tps-watcher and cc-uploader to work with bbs and locket versions that ship with diego-release v2.29.0 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164615630)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #118: Enable selective backups for internal blobstore [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163264961)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #123: Introduce optional staging on OPI [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163519546)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #128: Add v2 logging endpoint to CAPI root [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164318139)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #132: Ensure that cc ng waits to populate routes - second try [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164745558)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #134: CAPI will need to set `cflinuxfs3` as the default stack before cf-deployment v8 release [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164994581)
- log-stream endpoint in CAPI's root path (aka /) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164094017)


### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/bd01785d133dd2f425c49c1bd2e1b5c7535fef1c)

- **API** client can **create** a domain on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676286)
- **API** client can **create** a resource match on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161830301)
- **API** client can **get details** of a domain on the v3 API  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676342)
- **API** client can **list** domains on the v3 API  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676350)
- **API** client can create a domain **scoped to an organization** (private domain) on the v3 API  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676304)
- **API** client can specify a **path** and a **mode** when resource matching on the v3 API  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164610893)
- **API** client can specify matched resources using the **v3 format** when uploading packages on the v3 API  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164610913)
- **API** client should not need to upload a zip when uploading a package if resources are provided on the v3 API  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164843816)
- API Client can DELETE `/v3/sidecars/:guid` [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583657)
- API Client can GET `/v3/app/:guid/sidecars`  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583600)
- API Client can GET `/v3/processes/:guid/sidecars` [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583629)
- API Client can GET `/v3/sidecars/:guid` [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164648104)
- API Client can PATCH `/v3/sidecars/:guid`  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583592)
- API Client can POST /v3/app/:guid/sidecars with process command & a list of process types [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583581)
- API User can generate a manifest with sidecars  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164709815)
- API can rollback to a revision with a custom start command [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163462415)
- API client add, modify, and remove metadata on a Service Instance  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164144574)
- API client can observe the metadata section in docs examples for service instances [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164145118)
- API client can query services instances with label_selector [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164145199)
- Add and update app metadata via a server side manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163924841)
- Always set encryption_key_label for resources with encrypted columns [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164783374)
- As a service author, I see instance_name, organization_name and space_name in the context object  on a rename request from a customer using CF  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861852)
- As an operator, in order to make maintenance and debugging easier, I expect statefulset names to be named after the space and app name [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164204947)
- Cache and reuse UAA client tokens when fetching usernames [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164287696)
- Consume url from cc_uploader link in OPI config and remove property from jobs that dont perform staging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164557624)
- Explicitly set CURRENT_TIMESTAMP for created_at in web processes backfill migration [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164967119)
- Getting instance information should fail with insufficient resources [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162191392)
- Given a process with an associated sidecar resource, that sidecar runs in the same LRP container along with the process [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583682)
- Make sure bbs proto3 protobufs work with capi-release [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164348014)
- Non web processes should have a default port [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164994410)
- Pruning number of revisions [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163889655)
- Server-side app manifests can apply changes to sidecars [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164583702)
- Write the ADR talking about why factory_bot is harder than machinist [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164834657)
- `application_id` environment variable should be the application guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164842188)
- log-stream endpoint in CAPI's root path (aka /) [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164094017)
- v2 push fails with `UnknownError` when revisions are enabled for an app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164875768)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190320234146_create_service_instance_annotations_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bd01785d133dd2f425c49c1bd2e1b5c7535fef1c/db/migrations/20190320234146_create_service_instance_annotations_table.rb)
- [20190321214408_change_sidecar_process_type_name_to_type.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bd01785d133dd2f425c49c1bd2e1b5c7535fef1c/db/migrations/20190321214408_change_sidecar_process_type_name_to_type.rb)
- [20190326212736_add_app_guid_to_sidecar_process_types.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/bd01785d133dd2f425c49c1bd2e1b5c7535fef1c/db/migrations/20190326212736_add_app_guid_to_sidecar_process_types.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1288: Enable OPI staging [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163519429)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1301: Add v2 logging endpoint to CAPI root [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164318080)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1308: POST /v3/apps/:app_guid/tasks does not ignore null values for the parameters [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164459339)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1309: Non original admins cannot update service instances [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164493889)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1315: Allow token-scope-based admins to update service parameters. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164892457)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1316: Update opi apps client tests to reflect changes in eirini [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164982468)

name: CAPI 1.78.0
body:
**Highlights**
- Logcache requests for container metrics should have retry logic. This mitigates push downtime during logcache upgrades.
- Revisions now have system generated descriptions
- Revisions support custom start commands
- Service brokers can now set polling intervals and maximum polling durations for how often and for how long the platform will poll the broker during an operation
- Cloud Foundry users can now send organization name, space name, and instance name to their service broker providers


**CC API Version: 2.133.0 and [3.68.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.68.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/d1bf206662d9c807603e3d90e5b32ee6b7834643)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/951861bbd28dce4dc6e605ba360e8d118f1d222b)

- **API** client can **create** a domain [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162676286)
- **API** client can **discover a link** to the resource match resource
- **API** client should be able to **discover** domains on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163402494)
- **API** client should be able to **list** feature flags [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162747922)
- **API** client should be able to **update** a feature flag [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162748070)
- **API** client should be able to see the **details** of a feature flag [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162748045)
- **CLI** app dev should see a meaningful error message if they attempt to use health check HTTP and not have the HTTP endpoint set in the manifest [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164014761)
- Add description when a new revision is created [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162990244)
- As a **CC client**, if the bits service is **enabled**, I can see a **link** to the bits service API in **/** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161830316)
- As a service author, I can set a polling interval for `cf bind-service` so that my broker doesn't have to handle unnecessary numbers of requests [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163691035)
- As a service author, I can set a polling interval for `cf create-service` so that my broker doesn't have to handle unnecessary numbers of requests [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163422929)
- As a service author, I can set a polling interval for `cf delete-service` so that my broker doesn't have to handle unnecessary numbers of requests [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163690942)
- As a service author, I can set a polling interval for `cf unbind-service` so that my broker doesn't have to handle unnecessary numbers of requests [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163691034)
- As a service author, I can set a polling interval for `cf update-service` so that my broker doesn't have to handle unnecessary numbers of requests [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163690935)
- As a service author, I see context.organization_name and context.space_name on a bind request from a customer using CF [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163120008)
- As a service author, I see instance_name, organization_name and space_name in the context object on a provision and update request from a customer using CF [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861690)
- As a service author, I want `cf bind-service` to respect the max polling duration set on the plan level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861123)
- As a service author, I want `cf create-service` to respect the max polling duration set on the plan level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861066)
- As a service author, I want `cf delete-service` to respect the max polling duration set on the plan level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861093)
- As a service author, I want `cf unbind-service` to respect the max polling duration set on the plan level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861136)
- As a service author, I want `cf update-service` to respect the max polling duration set on the plan level [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163861101)
- Custom start commands for a process type are part of an app revision [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163127213)
- Feature Flags are not experimental in the API docs and v3 link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162748828)
- Only roll back to a revision with a droplet [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163889635)
- Remove unfinished v3 domains controller skeleton so that CAPI can release without permissions issues [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164473255)
- Revisions have a link to their environment variables [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163668607)
- log cache requests for container metrics should have retry logic [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/164150800)

#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20190220003646_add_encryption_iteration_count_to_buildpack_lifecycle_data.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/951861bbd28dce4dc6e605ba360e8d118f1d222b/db/migrations/20190220003646_add_encryption_iteration_count_to_buildpack_lifecycle_data.rb)
- [20190220003740_add_encryption_iteration_count_to_droplets.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/951861bbd28dce4dc6e605ba360e8d118f1d222b/db/migrations/20190220003740_add_encryption_iteration_count_to_droplets.rb)

- [20190220003847_add_encryption_iteration_count_to_packages.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/951861bbd28dce4dc6e605ba360e8d118f1d222b/db/migrations/20190220003847_add_encryption_iteration_count_to_packages.rb)

name: CAPI 1.77.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Added support for query labels in build and buildpacks V3 resources
- CAPI now returns a 503 error with the message "API down for maintenance" during a BBR backup
- Audit events are now captured when a revision and rollback are created
- Deployment resource now contains a reference to the revision that was deployed
- App resource now contains a reference to the all app revisions and deployed revisions

**CC API Version: 2.132.0 and [3.67.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.67.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/40cadcfabb8c088e2a47b009d7f7a33eb9545241)

- cloudfoundry/capi-release #121: CC clock fails to sync app processes, fails with vague certificate verification error [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163392787)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #124: Request a new capi release to include the latest aliyun fog library [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163580410)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/1441440e4becccc8bb23c36c0bf7113d6f486dec)


- **API** client can apply a manifest to **multiple existing apps** in a space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162555315)
- **API** client can apply a manifest to a space and see that **missing apps are created** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162556082)
- **API** client can apply a manifest to a space and see that **missing docker apps are created** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163575288)
- **API** client sees error when applying a space manifest with **no app names** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163098060)
- **API** client should be able to discover feature flags on the v3 API [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162748784)
- **API** client should see an **error** when applying a manifest with a **docker key** to an app with a buildpack lifecycle [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163601612)
- **API** client should see an **error** when applying a manifest with both a **docker key** and **buildpack key** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163660668)
- **Explore** create-buildpack API design **by/with** collaborating with the Bits Service and CAPI teams **to discover** a way for CC to handle bits service in all three (disabled + proxy + direct) modes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163641826)
- API client can query build with label_selector [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163489085)
- API client can query buildpack with label_selector [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163489372)
- API client can see that API requests fail due to being locked for BBR operations [503 while locked] [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/154448217)
- API lists deployed revisions for an app [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163631484)
- App dev should be able to use the -t flag and server side manifests [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/159289669)
- App resource contains link to app revisions [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163637038)
- As a developer, I can see the type of all service instances when fetching a space summary  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163455167)
- Audit event for rollbacks / revision [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163440540)
- CLI user can use a new --rename flag  with `cf update-buildpack` to rename their buildpacks [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163073636)
- Deployment contains a reference to a revision that was deployed [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163264741)
- Make blobstore benchmark utility easier to run [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163812362)
- Rollback to previous revision env variables [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163205927)
- Update GET a revision endpoint to /v3/revisions/:guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163440535)
- Update PATCH a revision endpoint to /v3/revisions/:guid [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163487094)
- translate old cf-release "how to fix accidental pushes to master" document to make sense for capi-release [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163641086)


#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

None

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- Scaling app via v2 api is not disabled during deployments [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163834033)
- Deployment post-start BuildpackInstaller fails with informative error messages for the StacklessAndStackfulMatchingBuildpacksExistError [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163332838)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1252: Fix ./bin/console script [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161792902)

name: CAPI 1.76.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Added full support for metadata in all V3 non-experimental resources
- Added ability to create a revision for an app when a new droplet is deployed and/or environment variables are applied and deployed
- Added ability to roll back to a previous app revision
- App Metrics can now be correlated for multiple processes into a single app
  - __Please note__ : With this update container metrics will no longer work with the traffic controller


**CC API Version: 2.131.0 and [3.66.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.66.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/5393107c34082af1b137bbbe929f832fd5a05b5e)

- Bump to go 1.11.5 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163460382)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #120: Fix chpst permissions issue [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163363758)
- bump capi-release ruby to 2.4.5 and vendor bosh-packages/ruby-release [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161737966)
- API client can **upload bits** for a buildpack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254773)
- cc.diego.enable_declarative_asset_downloads works with Windows apps [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162990531)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/f72f95a45eee7c60969b511091b0eec8826278c4)


- **API** client can apply a manifest to a single **existing app** in a space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162514867)
- A revision is created for an app when a new droplet is started [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162678702)
- A revision is created for an app when a new env vars are set and app is started  [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162988484)
- A revision is created for an app when new env vars are set and the app is deployed [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162988792)
- API client add, modify, and remove metadata on Build [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163489106)
- API client add, modify, and remove metadata on Buildpack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163489308)
- API client add, modify, and remove metadata on Isolation Segment [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163093161)

name: CAPI 1.75.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Ruby bumped to 2.4.5
- Metadata added to spaces, orgs, packages, droplets
- Added V3 support for stacks
- Default log format for tps_watcher and cc_uploader changing to use RFC3339

**CC API Version: 2.130.0 and [3.65.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.65.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/c8794aea75bbb6b395114273872ce291d9005ddd)
- As a CF operator, I expect to be able to opt CC into specifying LRP and Task asset downloads as declarative resources so that I can give the Diego and Garden components more flexibility in downloading and storing these assets [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/158950019)
- Bump to CSI 1.0.0 [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161904834)
- Deployments get pruned [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161688596)
- Operator can set limit on annotations per resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162092539)
- Write permissions in bundler home directory are insecure [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162359108)
- expose internal_route_vip_range as link [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162515686)
- operator should be able to use a manifest property to specify domains that are synced with Istio [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/159944349)
- bump capi-release ruby to 2.4.5 and vendor bosh-packages/ruby-release [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161737966)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/29e1d1351b5662c073f2f5a0bd2d05a3b1cf713c)
- API client can observe the annotations section in docs examples for spaces [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161662924)
- API client sees a documentation on updating metadata [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162316851)
- API client sees an optional annotations param in app, and org create and update docs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162316829)
- A revision is created for an app when a new droplet is deployed [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162678172)
- A revision is created for an app when a new droplet is started [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162678702)
- API client add, modify, and remove annotations on existing Packages [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162398055)
- API client add, modify, and remove labels on existing Packages [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162392052)
- API client can **create** a buildpack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254675)
- API client can **delete** a buildpack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254735)
- API client can **filter** buildpacks by **name** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254703)
- API client can **filter** buildpacks by **stack** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254710)
- API client can **get details** of a buildpack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254719)
- API client can **list** buildpacks [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254683)
- API client can **order** buildpacks by **position** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162745803)
- API client can add annotations to existing orgs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161660374)
- API client can add annotations to existing spaces [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161662931)
- API client can add annotations when creating a package [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162398054)
- API client can add annotations when creating an org [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161660378)
- API client can add annotations when creating an space [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161662930)
- API client can add labels when creating a package [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162392226)
- API client can add, modify, and remove annotations on existing Droplets [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162360283)
- API client can delete a stack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161738389)
- API client can discover v3 buildpacks resource from the v3 root endpoint [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162254590)
- API client can filter stacks by name [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161738403)
- API client can get details of a stack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161739655)
- API client can look up revision by version number [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162711010)
- API client can modify annotations on orgs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161660379)
- API client can modify annotations on spaces [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161662928)
- API client can query droplets with label_selector [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162315972)
- API client can query packages with label_selector [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162392050)
- API client can remove annotations from orgs [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161660377)
- API client can remove annotations from spaces [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161662926)
- API client can see buildpack **filename** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162258643)
- API client can see buildpack **state** [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162258469)
- API client can specify a process for a task and use that process's command [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161687164)
- API client sees all "webbish" processes as having the same type of "web" [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161730767)
- API client sees the process with the latest created_at timestamp when hitting endpoints that return a process for a given type (e.g. "web") [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161965165)
- Add app feature for revisions [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162711684)
- As an API client, I see an improved error message for unique stack name validation [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162027105)
- As an operator, I can see an audit event when an async service instance or binding create operation has begun [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161249256)
- Builds get pruned [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161688528)
- CloudController assigns a VIP to routes created on an internal domain [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162216623)
- Deployments get pruned [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161688596)
- Operator can set limit on annotations per resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162092539)
- Operator can set limit on labels per resource [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162097807)
- Pilot supports non-8080 app ports [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/157437921)
- Remove perm from V2 organizations endpoints [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162675856)
- Restrict querying of app labels to labels applied to apps in spaces provided [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161846666)
- Seeding domains should not attempt to re-save existing domains•¡© [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162357783)
- Updating current droplet for an app while a rolling deployment is in flight leads to broken deployments and potential app downtime [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162774920)
- User can specify "running" or "staging" when creating a Dynamic Egress Policy [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161904323)
- User can weight traffic equally on a route to two apps on different ports [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162390794)
- User with read-only permissions for stacks should get 404 when trying to delete a non-existent stack [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163106652)
- deployments should desire lrps synchronously [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162465589)


#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20181120230039_increase_app_annotations_resource_guid_column_length.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/29e1d1351b5662c073f2f5a0bd2d05a3b1cf713c/db/migrations/20181120230039_increase_app_annotations_resource_guid_column_length.rb)

- [20181127224109_add_vip_to_routes.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/29e1d1351b5662c073f2f5a0bd2d05a3b1cf713c/db/migrations/20181127224109_add_vip_to_routes.rb)

- [20181204184506_create_space_annotations_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/29e1d1351b5662c073f2f5a0bd2d05a3b1cf713c/db/migrations/20181204184506_create_space_annotations_table.rb)
- [20181207184247_create_droplet_labels_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/29e1d1351b5662c073f2f5a0bd2d05a3b1cf713c/db/migrations/20181207184247_create_droplet_labels_table.rb)
- [20181211230616_create_droplet_annotations_table.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/29e1d1351b5662c073f2f5a0bd2d05a3b1cf713c/db/migrations/20181211230616_create_droplet_annotations_table.rb)

name: CAPI 1.74.0
body:
**Highlights**

- Apps have annotations
- Syncing with Diego is more robust to errors
- Resolve an Issue where CAPI would fail to deploy if bosh-dns is slow

**CC API Version: 2.128.0 and [3.63.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.63.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/63578a86fd6af005d272345d8b1b1cf4c9c0d8df)

- Golang BOSH jobs should wait for bosh-dns to be ready [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161992597)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/3e6609b23bd6c4ba8a4ae295e965fc4ea48bb31f)

- API client can list stacks [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161739936)
- API client can observe a revision on processes [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161964205)
- API client can observe the annotations section in docs examples for apps [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161662751)
- API client can read about Annotations in API docs Concepts section [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161663031)
- Diego Sync should not exit 1 when it encounters an error syncing an individual LRP/task [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/162064721)
- Processes with an invalid stack should NOT cause Diego sync to fail [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161800100)


#### Cloud Controller Database Migrations

- [20181112143236_add_plan_updateable_to_service_plans.rb](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/blob/3e6609b23bd6c4ba8a4ae295e965fc4ea48bb31f/db/migrations/20181112143236_add_plan_updateable_to_service_plans.rb)

#### Pull Requests and Issues

- As a service broker author, I can specify whether or not plans can be updated in the plan object of the catalog [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161257412)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1255: Support plan_updateable on plan level. [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161959422)
- cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng #1256: Update cf-copilot gem in Gemfile [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161965635)
- cloudfoundry/capi-release #109: Add windows stack for lifecycle association

name: CAPI 1.73.0
body:
**Highlights**
- General Availability for /v3/service_instances API
- Resolved issue causing deployments to fail due to failed buildpack uploads
- Spaces have experimental support for labels

**CC API Version: 2.127.0 and [3.62.0](http://v3-apidocs.cloudfoundry.org/version/3.62.0/)**

**Service Broker API Version: [2.14](https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker/blob/v2.14/spec.md)**

### [CAPI Release](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/capi-release/tree/8ccd10d0e575c37d9fd24ec1148d536ecca1ef4a)
- Improve retry logic for buildpack uploads [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161296753)
- Organization relationship on space is GA [details](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161757820)

### [Cloud Controller](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cloud_controller_ng/tree/4e48e10d82ed899ae7b559f5c1f4b5a9c8ec5c9b)
